about_the_game:
Following the escape of a mutant virus from NASA, Jack's determination to rescue his wife leads players through a captivating narrative.

Armed to the teeth with a reliable pistol, grenades, and the formidable AK47, Jack defies the cautious stance of the FBI and ventures alone into the heart of the extraterrestrial threat.

Experience the intensity of both first and third-person shooter mechanics as you navigate a vast open-world landscape teeming with relentless undead and otherworldly enemies.

Unleash a barrage of bullets and explosives in a relentless pursuit of survival, where every shot counts, and each decision shapes the course of this epic rescue mission. The dynamic blend of action and suspense keeps players on the edge, immersed in a world where danger lurks around every corner.

Engage in strategic combat, utilizing the varied range of weapons at your disposal to thwart hordes of alien-zombies.

The meticulously crafted open-world setting offers freedom in exploration, with hidden challenges and rewards waiting to be discovered.

As Jack Styler, you're not just fighting for survival; you're unraveling a compelling story filled with twists, mysteries, and moments of unexpected heroism. Immersed in the engaging narrative, where the fate of Jack's wife and the world itself is at stake.

With its cinematic visuals, electrifying action, and a protagonist driven by unwavering determination, this game delivers an unparalleled gaming experience. Can you navigate the chaos, overcome the odds, and emerge victorious in the face of an extraterrestrial apocalypse?

Prepare for a relentless journey into the unknown, where each step could be your last, and each shot could change the destiny of humanity.

name: JACK STYLER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: mancer rodeon rtx 550 4gb

short_description: Former FBI agent and fishing enthusiast, faces an alien-zombie apocalypse after a virus escapes from NASA. Determined to rescue his wife, he defies the FBI and embarks alone to confront the threat. An epic rescue mission filled with action and suspense!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
